subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Jan Vesely and Tomas Satoransky had double-doubles to lead the Czech Republic past Croatia, 80-59, in Lille, France, and into the quarterfinals for the first time.
snippet: Jan Vesely and Tomas Satoransky had double-doubles to lead the Czech Republic past Croatia, 80-59, in Lille, France, and into the quarterfinals for the first time.
